meta.title: Albany Responds COVID-19 Food Drive — Albany High School

meta.content: Albany Responds COVID-19 Food Drive — Albany High School

AHS students are organizing a food drive for our neighbors in need. Because of Covid-19, the food drive is completely online. All proceeds benefit the Alameda County Food Bank, which is experiencing a huge surge in demand. Please visit: https://www.vfd-accfb.org/grouphome.aspx?ID=7372 , and donate

article.class: entry h-entry hentry category-general-news author-ahs-webmaster post-type-text clear

div.p: AHS students are organizing a food drive for our neighbors in need. Because of Covid-19, the food drive is completely online. All proceeds benefit the Alameda County Food Bank, which is experiencing a huge surge in demand. Please visit: https://www.vfd-accfb.org/grouphome.aspx?ID=7372, and donate as part of Albany High School, or an AHS club/sports team. If you're interested in having your club/team participate, please email fionamo21@ausdk12.org. Donations of all sizes are much appreciated. Thank you for helping our community during this challenging time!

div.span: Albany High School, 603 Key Route Boulevard, Albany, CA, 94706, United States

div.p: Albany Unified School District is committed to providing a website that is accessible to everyone who visits our site. If you have difficulty accessing any of the information on this site or have any recommendations on how we may be able to make our site more accessible, please let us know by emailing jmanibusuan@ausdk12.org
